sceneObjects
Class Rectangle

java.lang.Object
  sceneObjects.SceneObject
      sceneObjects.Rectangle
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISceneObject
public class Rectangle
extends SceneObject

This class represents the rectangle scene object. It is mainly used in the mesh object.
